name: Bullet Sponge
description:
Bullet Sponge is a game about dodging bullets as a sponge. you use your mouse to control "spongey" and you try to collect as much dirt as possible while getting to the end unscathed. The game has multiple branching pathways and a relativity challenging feel. With a newgrounds inspired art style and no shame for puns, its time to get SCRUBBING
music by the heatly bros. (royalty free)
Patch notes:
[v1.1]
-fixed an oversight that allowed players to go outside the boundries of the screen in fullscreen mode
-Fixed title on top of window to say "bullet SPONGE" instead of gamemaker:studio
-players can now enter fullscreen via the [F4] key
